title: Calories in a Cutie Mandarin Orange
meta_description: Discover calories in a cutie mandarin orange, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and more in label-style format with quick tweaks.
h1: Calories in a Cutie Mandarin Orange
assumptions: One medium Cuties brand mandarin orange (~75 g), fresh, peeled, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, brand, and storage; values are approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cutie mandarin orange has about 45 kcal and 11 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Eat two cuties instead of one
With a handful of almonds (10 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in a cutie orange?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 kcal per medium cutie mandarin orange.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cutie?
faqs.a: About 11 g total carbs, including 1.5 g fiber and 9 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a cutie have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.7 g protein and 0.3 g fat per cutie.
Yes, only about 1 mg sodium per cutie, naturally low.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in a cutie?
faqs.a: Smaller cuties have fewer calories (~35 kcal); larger ones up to 50 kcal. Adjust based on weight.
